name: py-pip
description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-setuptools
dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.

dependent_to.name: aomp
dependent_to.description: llvm openmp compiler from AMD.

dependent_to.name: py-dask-glm
dependent_to.description:
Dask-glm is a library for fitting Generalized Linear Models on large
datasets.

dependent_to.name: py-illumina-utils
dependent_to.description:
A library and collection of scripts to work with Illumina paired-end
data (for CASAVA 1.8+).

dependent_to.name: py-chalice
dependent_to.description: Python Serverless Microframework for AWS.

dependent_to.name: py-azureml-pipeline-core
dependent_to.description: Core functionality to enable azureml-pipeline feature.

dependent_to.name: py-azureml-automl-core
dependent_to.description:
The azureml-automl-core package is a package containing functionality
used by the azureml-train-automl package.

dependent_to.name: py-azureml-train-restclients-hyperdrive
dependent_to.description:
The azureml-train-restclients-hyperdrive contains functionality for
azureml-train metapackage.

dependent_to.name: rocblas
dependent_to.description: Radeon Open Compute BLAS library

dependent_to.name: ascent
dependent_to.description:
Ascent is an open source many-core capable lightweight in situ
visualization and analysis infrastructure for multi-physics HPC
simulations.

dependent_to.name: py-opencensus-context
dependent_to.description: OpenCensus Runtime Context.

dependent_to.name: py-azureml-core
dependent_to.description:
The azureml-core contains functionality for creating and managing: *
Azure Machine Learning workspaces, experiments and runs; * Machine
learning compute respources; * Models, images and web services.

dependent_to.name: py-azureml-dataprep-native
dependent_to.description: Python Package for AzureML DataPrep specific native extensions.

dependent_to.name: dsqss
dependent_to.description:
DSQSS is a program package for solving quantum many-body problems
defined on lattices. It is based on the quantum Monte Carlo method in
Feynman's path integral representation.

dependent_to.name: py-dotnetcore2
dependent_to.description: .Net Core 2.1 runtime.

dependent_to.name: py-pyprecice
dependent_to.description:
This package provides python language bindings for the C++ library
preCICE.

dependent_to.name: py-azureml-dataset-runtime
dependent_to.description:
The purpose of this package is to coordinate dependencies within AzureML
packages. It is not intended for public use.

dependent_to.name: py-azureml-dataprep-rslex
dependent_to.description:
Azure Machine Learning Data Prep RsLex is a Rust implementation of Data
Prep's capabilities to load, transform, and write data for machine
learning workflows.

dependent_to.name: py-azureml-train
dependent_to.description:
The azureml-train package provides estimators for training models using
different deep learning frameworks and functionality for hyperparameter
tuning using Azure cloud.

dependent_to.name: py-intel-openmp
dependent_to.description:
Intel OpenMP* Runtime Library x86_64 dynamic libraries for macOS*. Intel
OpenMP* Runtime Library provides OpenMP API specification support in
Intel C Compiler, Intel C++ Compiler and Intel Fortran Compiler. It
helps to improve performance by creating multithreaded software using
shared memory and running on multi-core processor systems.

dependent_to.name: py-itk
dependent_to.description: ITK is an open-source toolkit for multidimensional image analysis

dependent_to.name: py-azureml-pipeline
dependent_to.description:
The Azure Machine Learning SDK for Python can be used to create ML
pipelines as well as to submit and track individual pipeline runs.

dependent_to.name: py-azureml-train-automl-client
dependent_to.description:
The azureml-train-automl-client package contains functionality for
automatically finding the best machine learning model and its
parameters, given training and test data.

dependent_to.name: py-azureml-sdk
dependent_to.description: Microsoft Azure Machine Learning Python SDK.

dependent_to.name: py-azureml-dataprep
dependent_to.description: Azure ML Data Preparation SDK.

dependent_to.name: py-apache-beam
dependent_to.description: Apache Beam is a unified programming model for Batch and Streaming.

dependent_to.name: xyce
dependent_to.description:
Xyce (rhymes with 'spice') is an open source, SPICE-compatible, high-
performance analog circuit simulator, capable of solving extremely large
circuit problems by supporting large-scale parallel computing platforms.
Xyce also supports serial execution on all common desktop platforms, and
small-scale parallel runs on Unix-like systems. In addition to analog
electronic simulation, Xyce has also been used to investigate more
general network systems, such as neural networks and power grids.

dependent_to.name: py-azureml-train-core
dependent_to.description:
The azureml-train-core contains functionality used by azureml-train
metapackage.

dependent_to.name: py-azureml-telemetry
dependent_to.description:
Machine learning (ML) telemetry package is used to collect telemetry
data.

dependent_to.name: py-inference-schema
dependent_to.description:
This package is intended to provide a uniform schema for common machine
learning applications, as well as a set of decorators that can be used
to aid in web based ML prediction applications.

dependent_to.name: ont-albacore
dependent_to.description:
Albacore is a software project that provides an entry point to the
Oxford Nanopore basecalling algorithms. It can be run from the command
line on Windows and multiple Linux platforms. A selection of
configuration files allow basecalling DNA libraries made with our
current range of sequencing kits and Flow Cells.

dependent_to.name: py-azureml-pipeline-steps
dependent_to.description: Represents a unit of computation in azureml-pipeline.
